tool_description: Provides insights and fortunes based on Chinese Zodiac signs in both Simplified and Traditional languages.

api_list.name: Get Zodiac
api_list.description: Returns specific zodiac fortune based on the provided sign, period, and language.

required_parameters.name: sign
required_parameters.description: The zodiac sign for which the fortune is requested.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language option: Chinese Simplified or Traditional.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description: The time period for which the fortune is requested.
